question: Display chalets and cabins that cost $200 per night.
sql_query1:
SELECT Chalets.chaletName as name
FROM Chalets
WHERE Chalets.pricePerNight = 200.0
UNION
SELECT Cabins.cabinName as name
FROM Cabins
WHERE Cabins.pricePerNight = 200.0
sql_query2:
SELECT Chalets.chaletName as name
FROM Chalets
UNION
SELECT Cabins.cabinName as name
FROM Cabins
WHERE Cabins.pricePerNight = 200.0
interpretation1: Can you show chalets and cabins that cost $200 per night?
interpretation2: List all chalets and also display cabins that cost $200 per night.
